Encounter.Name: TIE Sabotage
Encounter.Notes: This encounter may or may not take place, depending upon how clumsy or how efficient the PCs are in sabotaging the TIE fighters. Half of the TIE fighters (Squadron Alpha, in this case) are on maneuvers at any given time, leaving a squadron of TIE fighter pilots (what I'm calling Squadron Beta), plus a group of technicians in the hangar bay. Modify this encounter to fit the number of each type of adversary that you want your PCs to fight.
